name: Hit A Bit Ball Game
description:
This is a traditional pong game with new, better graphics and fancy style and music.

Music Licensing - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Controlls~

1. Up and Down arrow keys to move bar up and down on right side.

2. W and S keys to move the bar up and down on left side.

Game Developed by AYG Games. Resources used Python 3.7, Pygame, 

Python Modules Sys, Random, cx_freeze.

Music by playonloop.com.

Thanks, please visit https://ayushman-singh-rajora.itch.io/ 

to look at more of interesting games from AYG Games.

Thanks For Downloading.
